bio:
I'm a seasoned Web Developer with over 11 years of experience building scalable web applications and digital solutions. Throughout my career, I've delivered projects ranging from startup MVPs to enterprise-level applications, collaborating with distributed teams across multiple time zones to create exceptional user experiences.
My expertise centers on modern web technologies including Angular, React, Next.js, and Node.js, with a strong focus on creating polished, performant, and user-centric interfaces. I've also specialized in Business Intelligence platforms, developing robust data-driven dashboards by extending native components and building highly customizable user experiences that enable data-driven decision making.
I'm committed to leveraging cutting-edge technologies, implementing industry best practices, and delivering high-quality solutions that drive business value - from initial concept to full-scale enterprise implementations. Let's discuss how I can help bring your vision to life.
